gather-edit-collection-confirm:
Pre-Placement meet: An imperative forum on campus to make the students aware of the organization in terms of its business, relevant job profile, future, career growth prospects and the remuneration offered.
Registration by students: Interested students register with the company representatives on the spot after the pre-placement talk.
Selection Process as per Company directives: Students undergo the relevant procedures followed by companies such as technical test, group discussion and personal HR interview and final interview.
